com.example.medirem_project

Class NotificationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • com.example.medirem_project.NotificationHelper

  • public class NotificationHelper
extends android.content.ContextWrapper
    NotificationHelper is used to create and manage notification channels. It also constructs notifications. NotificationHelper has ContextWrapper as its superclass. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ub4_f6ksxL0

      • getChannelNotification

        public androidx.core.app.NotificationCompat.Builder getChannelNotification(java.lang.String title,
                                                                           java.lang.String message)
        Sets default settings for notification and creates intent for opening app through notification.
        Parameters:
        title - Title of the notifications, Declared in AlertReceiver.
        message - Message of the notification, Declared in AlertReceiver.
        Returns:
        Returns ChannelID for notification, title of notification, message of notification and icon for notification to use. Also sets autocancel to true so notification gets destroyed after you click it, and sets pending intent for opening application after clicking.
